title: IUSF hands over petition to NHRC
body_lines: The Inter University Students Federation (IUSF) today handed over a petition to National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) against the supression of rights of the protesters against the government during the past few days by the police.

The Liberal Fellowship and Freedom Fellowship also handed over missives to NHRC against the violation of right of the protesters  during the past few days by the law enforcement authorities. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
